practicePlans.title: Sample Practice Plan
practicePlans.warmup: Jogging, sprawls, shots, hip heist drill - 15 min

technique.notes: Focus on level change and penetration step

practicePlans.liveWrestling: 3 x 3-minute periods situational from neutral - 25 min
practicePlans.notes: Emphasis on finishing takedowns this week

wrestlerNotes.name: Sample Wrestler
wrestlerNotes.notes: Working on stand-up technique and switch

wrestlers.name: Opponent Name
wrestlers.style: Aggressive on feet, likes single leg
wrestlers.notes: Counter with sprawl, look for front headlock
